subject: Re: [junit] Is there any logging facility in jUnit?

I suppose you tried
	"assertEquals("Message", Obj1, Obj2);"
and you where not happy with it
and you tried to have log4J statements without  being happy about it,
have you ?

Thomas,


Bret Waldow wrote:

> If I want to put messages from my test into the output of jUnit (perhaps
> only in the text ui, for instance) is there a call to allow this?  I haven't
> found one yet.
> 
> Of course, jUnit puts all it's own messages out, and any exceptions that are
> thrown, but how about just log messages?
> 
> regards,
> Bret
